attributes.action: Investigate all Disability & Incapacity Claims more throughly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know many people that claim Disability or Incapacity benefit but have nothing wrong with them or the child they are claiming for. This frustrates me as they are then entitled to almost as much money as a job would pay so they have no intentions of ever working. Honest people like myself bringing up a young son on my own have to stuggle financially while the dishonest people have no financial worries.
